DOC.detailed_description: TAC one important immunosuppressive agent organ transplantation . In patient dose concentration TAC difficult adjust narrow therapeutic index variable pharmacokinetics . Many factor affect pharmacokinetics TAC . Literature suggest ABCB1 , CYP3A4 , CYP3A5 , POR gene polymorphism may affect pharmacokinetics TAC . In addition , distribution TAC affect hematocrit albumin concentration . The pharmacokinetics TAC may also affect total protein , total bilirubin , creatinine , AST , ALT , gender , age , drug interaction , . This study intend analyze influence various factor , include drug , pharmacokinetics TAC .
